GetActive Slim Pedometer (Black) Price: Rs.2999

Launching getactive slim - a cool and slim device to track steps distance calories active time and sleep. Experience the information on cloud and enjoy the connectivity with your social group online. You can compete on virtual treks across the world win designer badges and earn GetActive currency to redeem goodies. GetActive plans to address 60 percentage of total death toll worldwide today caused by lifestyle related health conditions. That is 38 million lives which are lost every year due to insufficient physical activity.
